events.message: Customer reported a sudden collision involving their car at the intersection, requesting immediate assistance.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a vehicle collision.
An agent was assigned to handle the claim and coordinate the next steps with the customer.
Customer received official acknowledgement of the claim submission and details on the upcoming process.
Requested police report, photos of vehicle damage, and driver’s license for further claim processing.
Customer promptly submitted all the required documents including accident photos and official police report.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted materials and contacted involved parties for statements.
Completed full investigation confirming liability and assessing damage extent on the customer’s vehicle.
A settlement offer was proposed based on the damage report and policy coverage to the customer.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt assessment and clarity of the proposed settlement.
The claim was officially approved, authorizing payout to proceed according to settlement terms.
Payment for the approved claim was issued to the customer’s account as per policy agreement.
Claim has been formally closed after successful payment and final confirmation from the customer.
All documents and records related to the claim have been archived for future reference.
